spec_data.Name: boost-numpy
spec_data.Description:
The Boost Python Library is a framework for interfacing Python and
C++. It allows you to quickly and seamlessly expose C++ classes,
functions and objects to Python, and vice versa, using no special
tools -- just your C++ compiler.  This package contains run-time
support for the NumPy extension of the Boost Python Library for Python 2.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 25 Sep 2017 01:02:43 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Run-time component of boost python numpy extension
